sourcesContent:
Profile

Email: {{ data.email }}

Display Name: {{ data.displayName }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/service/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'], }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { data: any; editMode: boolean = false; addressLine1: string = ''; city: string= ''; state: string= ''; postalCode: string= ''; displayName: string= ''; email: string= ''; constructor(private auth: AuthService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getProfile(); } getProfile() { this.auth.getProfile().subscribe( (res) => { console.log(res); if (res.success) { this.data = res.data; } else { } }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } logout() { localStorage.clear(); this.router.navigate(['/dashboard']); } editAddress() { this.editMode = true; this.addressLine1 = this.data.address?.addressLine1; this.city = this.data.address?.city; this.state = this.data.address?.state; this.postalCode = this.data.address?.postalCode; } saveAddress() { const address = { addressLine1: this.addressLine1, city: this.city, state: this.state, postalCode: this.postalCode, }; this.auth.updateAddress(address).subscribe( (res) => { if (res.success) { this.editMode = false; this.data.address = address; } }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } cancelAddress() { this.editMode = false; } }
